import React, { Component } from 'react'; const initData = { // pre_heading: "SafeArt", heading: "SafeArt", content: "MINTED: ?? / ??", description: "mint - price: Gas + NFT price", btn_1: "Wallet Connect", btn_2: "Create" } class Hero extends Component { state = { data: {} } componentDidMount(){ this.setState({ data: initData }) } render() { return (
{this.state.data.pre_heading}

{this.state.data.heading}

{this.state.data.content}

{this.state.data.description}

{/* Buttons */}
{this.state.data.btn_1}
{/* Shape */} {/*
*/} {/* */} {/*
*/}
); } } export default Hero;
